column4: anyone know how I can get xorg to remember my screen resolution?, I set the res to 1024x768 using the nVidia X Server config prog, and save it to xorg.conf, but every time I turn the PC on, it reverts back to 800x600
just plymouth oe the whole thing ?
I'm not using desktop effects, it's the entire desktop res that reverts to 800x600
what did ActionParsnip say ? try that 1st
